授業目的:
Students will improve English skills by reading, writing and listening to science-based materials.
Topics are related to students' majors.
到達目標:
At the end of the semester, students will acquire the following skills.
1. Scanning research – Students search and scan information on the Internet, and extract what is needed for their report and presentation.
2. Organising information – Students organise information into an appropriate form and size for reporting, writing and presenting.
3. Thinking ahead – Students think about their own solutions based on the knowledge they have got, which will be implemented in their writing and presentation.
授業方法: Basically online teaching is held this semester. However, occasionally face-to-face teaching is held, which will be advised in advance.
